question:
A:the writer’s trip to Yogyakarta    B:the writer’s first visit to Prambanan

C:the writer’s experience at Yogya Kraton

D:the writer’s impression about Borobudur

15.	What is the purpose of the text above? *

A:to inform about Yogyakarta

B:to inform about Hotel in Yogyakarta

C:to tell beautiful place in Yogyakarta

D:to tell the writer’s experience in Yogyakarta

16. We arrived there at 3 pm (paragraph 3)The underline word is refers to . . . . *


A:Yogya Kraton

B:friendly guide

C:Borobudur temple

D:Jakarta

17. When did they go home? *


A:on Friday evening

B:on Friday afternoon

C:on Saturday morning

D:on Friday morning

18. Why did they only visit Brahmana and Syiwa temples? *


A:because there was no Wisnu temple

B:because Wisnu temple was to small

C:because Wisnu temple was being repaire

D:because Wisnu temple was being destroyed
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

14. A

15. A

16. C

17. B

18. C

Penjelasan:

maaf kalau salah :v

A:the writer’s trip to Yogyakarta

D:to tell the writer’s experience in Yogyakarta

C:Borobudur temple

A:on Friday evening

related_questions.question:
8. what ...... you ....... now ?    a. is -- doing
 b. are - doing
c. am-doing 
d. were - doing

Bantu jawab lagi kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul 

​

Dimas:Hi doni (1)....    Doni:fahri?
Dimas:yes he is the new student from salatiga
Doni:oh,Dimas:Hi doni (1)....
Doni:fahri?
Dimas:yes he is the new student from salatiga
Doni:oh,the one who is little big fat and wears glasses?
Dimas:thats right do you know where he is now?
Doni:i think he is in the library he usually (2)...his break there
Dimas:he is very fond of reading isnt he?
Doni:yes i often see him reading a book 
Dimas:okay,thank you i'll see him in the library nowthe one who is little big fat and wears glasses?
Dimas:thats right do you know where he is now?
Doni:i think he is in the library he usually (2)...his break there
Dimas:he is very fond of reading isnt he?
Doni:yes i often see him reading a book 
Dimas:okay,thank you i'll see him in the library now


Whats is the appropriate expression to complete the dialog
A.Who is the boy
B.Is the boy Fahri
C.Do you know Fahri
D.What does Fahri do

2.	What is the correct form of verb to complete the sentence? 
A.spent
B.spend
C.spends
D.is spending

3.	“He is very fond of reading, isn’t he? The underlined word has similar meaning as …. 
A.interesting
B.loving
C.boring
D.tiring​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. C

2.A

3. A

Penjelasan:

kalau salah mohon maaf yaa

tolong dibenarkan ya kalau salah ya kak

semangat belajarnya kakkk !!!! ,,,,, :)

1. D. Messy

2. D. Hide and Seek

3. C. Window

Penjelasan:

Hide and Seek = petak umpet

Window = jendela

hope you find this helpful ^•^

Jawaban:

sebenarnya aku tidak bisa bantu jawab tapi,cara jawabnya itu yang di kotak bacaan "you" ada bacaan "time" jadi kamu tulis jamnya, dan bacaan "activities" kamu tulis aktivitas kamu pada jam itu, terus yang ada bacaan "your friend" itu aktivitas dan waktu dari teman kamu, "wake up" artinya bangun tidur

related_questions.question: The following words are adverbs of manner except, artinyaa

The following text is for questions number 26 - 30.    Baturaden is a tourist destination in Banyumas regency, Central Java, Indonesia. It is located in the northern
town of Purwokerto just on the south slope of Mount Slamet with height 640 m above sea level. The air temper
ture ranges between 180-25° Celsius with humidity from 70 to 80 mm Hg.
The air in Baturaden is very cool but the scenery is very beautiful and natural. From the town of Purwokerto, the
road to this Baturraden is only about 14 km to the north, and can be reached by public transportation.
Baturaden also a tourist area visited by many local tourists, as well as foreign tourists, especially on Sundays
and national holidays. To accommodate them, there are some hotels and inn available there. ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

terjemahan

Baturaden adalah tujuan wisata di Kabupaten Banyumas, Jawa Tengah, Indonesia. Itu terletak di utara

kota Purwokerto tepat di lereng selatan Gunung Slamet dengan ketinggian 640 m di atas permukaan laut. Temperatur udara

suhu berkisar antara 180-25° Celcius dengan kelembaban 70 hingga 80 mm Hg.

Udara di Baturaden sangat sejuk namun pemandangannya sangat indah dan alami. Dari kota Purwokerto,

jalan menuju Baturraden ini hanya berjarak sekitar 14 km ke arah utara, dan dapat ditempuh dengan kendaraan umum.

Baturaden juga merupakan kawasan wisata yang banyak dikunjungi wisatawan lokal, maupun wisatawan mancanegara, terutama pada hari Minggu

dan hari libur nasional. Untuk menampung mereka, ada beberapa hotel dan penginapan yang tersedia di sana.

related_questions.question: The shop...late yesterday a. closed B. close C closes d. closing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. closed

Penjelasan:

Kenapa yang closed? Karena disitu udah ada kata yesterday yang dimana artinya kemarin sehingga harus menggunakan Past Tense yang dimana past tense ini verbnya (kata kerja) menggunakan bentuk kedua.
